description: Listed Building Consent application in connection with the erection of a full width rear extension at basement level and a half width rear extension at ground floor level (Full planning application reference P080299 also submitted)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: Notwithstanding the details shown on approved plans MS-P 02a,03a, and 05a  listed building consent is not given for the window and door arrangement proposed for the rear elevation of the extension. Details of the elevation shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to the work commencing, & those works shall thereafter be carried out in accordance with the details as finally approved & shall be so maintained thereafter.

REASON: In order that the finished appearance of the extension shall be sympathetic to the architectural character of the original listed building, so as to accord with the principles laid down in PPG15 (Planning & the Historic Environment).
